row.text: lippum medicum, per quem ad fidem catholicam deducatur. Zarncke Der Priester Iohannes in Abhandl. der Sächsisch. Ges. d. Wiss. XVII. 941, (Gesta Heinrici II., olim Benedicto Petroburg. tributa, 1178 ed. Stubbs I. 210, Rogeri de Hoved. Annal. 1178 ap. Savdle R. A. SS. p. 381“, ed. Stabbs II. 168. Ransi XXI. 907.
